subject: Anyone managed to run JUnit 4.4 in PDE JUnit in eclipse?
msgSnippet: Hi, I m aware that this issue is eclipse specific and only indirectly related to JUnit but I thought there might be someone lurking on this list that has run
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm aware that this issue is eclipse specific and only indirectly
related to JUnit but I thought there might be someone lurking on this
list that has run into the same issue that I currently have:

I'm trying to run a JUnit 4.4 based runner (Bumblebee) under a
plugintest in eclipse. It turns out that eclipse 3.3 (and even 3.4M4)
uses JUnit 4.3.1.
I thought that shouldn't stop me so I tried to create plugin that
bundles the JUnit 4.4 jar instead hoping that eclipse would not depend
on anything that changed between the two versions.

The thing is that I'm really green in the field of eclipse-development
and I'm not sure if it doesn't work because the JUnit runner is
incompatible with the 4.4 version or if I simply stuffed up my plugin
(that I struggled with for a whole evening just to realize the day
after that the create-plugin from existing jars works just fine in
eclipse 3.3 but not so well in eclipse 3.4M4.

Has /anyone/ had /any/ success running a /plugin/ test that uses a
/junit 4.4/ based runner in /any downloadable version/ of eclipse? I
spent way to much time on this already...

--
-----------------------------------------------------
Joakim Ohlrogge
